resources.string: Oops! Did you press the wrong one?
Not a great streak, but you can improve it!
You’ve gone high, though not quite skyscraper-high
Great job, keep it up! That wasn’t just luck, right?
Wow! You’re like a walking encyclopedia!
Are you sure you want to reset your record to 0?
